price: Do not be too tight-fisted[27], nor too open-handed[28], for you will end up blameworthy and destitute.
arabic: وَلَا تَجۡعَلۡ يَدَكَ مَغۡلُولَةً إِلَىٰ عُنُقِكَ وَلَا تَبۡسُطۡهَا كُلَّ ٱلۡبَسۡطِ فَتَقۡعُدَ مَلُومٗا مَّحۡسُورًا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
